td.span: Details of Employer’s/Employee’s Contributions to CPF for the Year Ended 31 Dec
Fill in this form if applicable and give it to your employee by 1 Mar

b.span: This Form will take about 10 minutes to complete. Please get ready the employee’s personal particulars, details of his/her employment income and CPF contributions in respect of Singapore employment. Please read the explanatory notes when completing this form.

td.span: FULL NAME OF EMPLOYEE AS PER NRIC / FIN
TAX REF. NO.: * NRIC / FIN (Foreign Identification No.)
If employment commenced and/or ceased during the year, state :
DATE OF S’PORE PR STATUS GRANTED (IF GRANTED ON / AFTER 1 Jan 2015)
DATE OF RENOUNCEMENT OF S’PORE PR
SECTION A: Details of monthly wages and actual contributions (See Explanatory Note 5)

b.span:
Has approval been given by CPF Board to make full contributions (for SPR status granted on / after 1 Jan 2015): Yes
No

td.span: SECTION B : Excess/Voluntary contribution to CPF (See Explanatory Note 5)

b.span: Please complete Section C if you or your employee has claimed / will claim a refund of the excess CPF contribution from CPF Board.

td.span:
SECTION C : Details of Refund claimed / to be claimed on excess CPF contributions made in
(See Explanatory Note 5)
Name of authorised person making the declaration
@ Please indicate the date refund was received. If the refund has not been received, please indicate the date the claim was made or expected to be made as at the date of completion of this form

span.b: There are penalties for failing to give a return or furnishing an incorrect or late return.
